lexUnit.name: embed.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: fix firmly and deeply in a surrounding mass

sentence.text: With the last of his strength Aenarion crawled to the altar and drove the blade back into its resting place , embedding it so deep that none could ever draw it forth again .
